body: I love the auto-zoning feature in HB which generates floors and perimeter zones for you. It works well for towers. Now I am trying to figure out how to assign daysim dimming schedules I generated for a single floor, 5 zone model, to the North, East, West and South zones of the tower without having to list out each zone on each exposure and pass it through a schedules assignment component. Any efficiencies here? Many thanks again.
